welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Motherwell, a charming town known for its industrial heritage and friendly locals. We invite you to discover the beauty of this town and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glasgow International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: T2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is a smaller terminal that serves mostly low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Edinburgh Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Prestwick Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Prestwick Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
